mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_free_${clubIdx}(clubFreeIdx, userIdx, clubIdx, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES(#{clubFreeIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{clubIdx}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_free_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx
mapper.update: UPDATE club_free_${clubSeq} SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT clubFreeIdx, m.userIdx, userName, subject, content ,hitCount, f.created, saveFilename, originalFilename FROM club_free_${clubSeq} f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubFreeIdx, subject FROM club_free_${clubSeq} f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubFreeIdx > #{num})
ORDER BY clubFreeIdx ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubFreeIdx, subject FROM club_free_${clubSeq} f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubFreeIdx < #{num})
ORDER BY clubFreeIdx DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE club_free_${clubIdx} SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{clubFreeIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_free_reply_${clubSeq}(cfrIdx , clubFreeIdx, userIdx, content, answer) VALUES (club_free_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{clubFreeIdx},#{userIdx}, #{content}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_free_reply_${clubSeq} WHERE clubFreeIdx=#{num} AND answer=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT tbreply.cfrIdx , clubFreeIdx, userName, userIdx ,content, created, tbreply.answer ,NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, memImg AS saveFilename FROM ( ( SELECT cfrIdx, r.clubFreeIdx, r.userIdx, userName, r.content, r.created, answer, memImg FROM club_free_reply_${clubSeq} r JOIN club_free_${clubSeq} n ON r.clubFreeIdx=n.clubFreeIdx JOIN memberinfo m ON r.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE r.clubFreeIdx=#{num} AND answer=0 ) tbreply LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM club_free_reply_${clubSeq} GROUP BY answer ) tbanswer ON tbreply.cfrIdx = tbanswer.answer ) ORDER BY cfrIdx DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}

SELECT cfrIdx, clubFreeIdx, tbreply.userIdx, userName, content, created, answer FROM club_free_reply_${clubSeq} tbreply JOIN memberInfo m ON tbreply.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE answer=#{answer} ORDER BY cfrIdx DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_free_reply_${clubSeq} WHERE answer=#{answer}
